## Concepts (N) {.unnumbered}

## Complex outcomes beyond binary

In this section, we explore regressions for outcomes beyond binary:

-   Polytomous regression
-   Survival analysis
-   Poisson regression

## Reading list

Key reference: [@hosmer2013applied; @kleinbaum2011survival; @coxe2009analysis]
